HORNETS MUST BE TACKLED!

SPIDER: HORNET SMASH is a free promotional game for Spider: The Secret of Bryce Manor, iPhone Game of the Year!
-----------------------------

FURIOUS NON-STOP ACTION
- Frenetic arcade style gameplay.
- Waves of hornets are invading, smash as many as you can!
- Dodge the attacks of angry hornets, eat tasty lacewings for health, and fight to stay alive!

TRY ONE OF THE IPHONE'S MOST ORIGINAL GAMES
- Experience one of the top iPhone/iPod Touch games of 2009!
- Natural, intuitive controls designed explicitly for the iPhone and iPod Touch.
- Includes SPIDER LITE -- one complete level from the award-winning Spider: The Secret of Bryce Manor.

GLOBAL ONLINE LEADERBOARDS
- Compete with other Hornet Smash players around the world for high scores.
- Compare scores with your friends using Facebook Connect!

SAVE ANYWHERE
- Exit your game at any time.
- Next time you play, start right where you left off!
